messages.subject: People were asking...
messages.msgSnippet: me about the new list for our children, so I thought I would just send this to the lists as well so that you all know a bit more about me if you were not
messages.messageBody:
me about the new list for our children, so I thought I would just send this
to the lists as well so that you all know a bit more about me if you were
not around for my intro or forgot who I was <G>

I would much rather parents be concerned as I would be too!

I personally will be monitoring it. I am a Program director for Cub Scouts
(150 boys in my care...ACK!), am becoming a 4H leader, run an animal
shelter, have been a foster mom and many other things...

There will be NO cussing at all allowed. That is grounds for immediate
removal as is porno or anything like that!

The idea formed in my head about 2 months ago but summer was here and it
got put on the back burner...then, this week, my son went to a chat and was
afraid to post as they move too fast for him and he cannot spell for beans!
I wanted a safe place for him to make his own online friends, like I have.

Now that he is home with me all the time, he does not have friends in
school to talk to so I wanted a place where he could talk to kids around
his age, where there was some control but was also a place for him to learn
spelling and relating in another format.

Parents are allowed to monitor...there is web access for reading the mail
so in effect, all of us can monitor it. I have it set so the web only is
for members...I think...will look into that now, so you may want to join so
that you can see what is going on...

Any other questions, you are more than welcome to ask!

The address for this is http://groups.yahoo.com/group/unschooledfriends


Jessi
